forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. WNW winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 42F. WNW winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers. High 53F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy and windy early with a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. WNW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy early with showers becoming likely later at night. Low 43F. WNW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
